name: Sagefy
description: Adaptive, collaborative, and open learning platform.

scripts.start: npm run clean && concurrently -p "[{name}]" --names rewrite-html,copy-fonts,watch-styles,watch-scripts "npm run rewrite-html" "npm run copy-fonts" "npm run watch-styles" "npm run watch-scripts"
scripts.test: npm run clean && concurrently -p "[{name}]" --names lint-scripts,run-tests "npm run lint-scripts" "npm run run-tests"
scripts.deploy: npm run clean && concurrently -p "[{name}]" --names rewrite-html,copy-fonts,compress-styles,compress-scripts "npm run rewrite-html" "npm run copy-fonts" "npm run compress-styles" "npm run compress-scripts"
scripts.copy-statics: cp -a app/images/* distribution/ && cp -a app/*.{html,txt,ico} distribution/
scripts.rewrite-html: npm run copy-statics && gulp rewrite\ html
scripts.watch-statics: npm run copy-statics && gulp watch\ statics
scripts.compress-styles: npm run build-styles && cleancss distribution/index.css -o distribution/index.css
scripts.watch-styles: npm run build-styles && gulp watch\ styles
scripts.build-scripts: concurrently -p "[{name}]" --names build-styleguide,compile-content "npm run build-styleguide" "npm run compile-content" && gulp build\ scripts
scripts.watch-scripts: npm run build-scripts && gulp watch\ scripts
scripts.compress-scripts: npm run build-scripts && uglifyjs distribution/index.js -o distribution/index.js
scripts.build-test-scripts: concurrently -p "[{name}]" --names build-styleguide,compile-content "npm run build-styleguide" "npm run compile-content" && gulp build\ test\ scripts

author: Sagefy
